item.endrem.old_eye.description: §7§oLegends say this eye once belonged to one of the great Bee Queens
item.endrem.rogue_eye.description: §7§oThe eye of the Naga you just killed, or maybe you found this in that Naga's pocket.
item.endrem.nether_eye.description: §7§oIt was lost by a demon in the battle between the Aether and the Nether
item.endrem.cold_eye.description: §7§oHonestly, it's just some leftover residue of Thermal Paste. Whyd you even put this in your pocket??
item.endrem.magical_eye.description: §7§oSomeone must have added two dashes too much of goodness to the Infused Eye of Ender.
item.endrem.black_eye.description: §7§oPirates say it gave sight to the legendary Black pearl
item.endrem.wither_eye.description: §7§oHas witnessed destruction. Maybe it also witnessed your stuff disappear
item.endrem.guardian_eye.description: §7§oIt has seen many warriors drown into the depths of the Dark Forest
item.endrem.cursed_eye.description: §7§oSomething must have gone horribly wrong when making an Infused Eye of Ender
item.endrem.evil_eye.description: §7§oAn unholy talisman said to bring its owner bad luck
item.endrem.undead_eye.description: §7§oIt's alive! Oh my god!! Oh, no, this is just a cool piece of shaped plastic that fell off while making some plastic. You decide to pocket it.
item.endrem.corrupted_eye.description: §7§oThe eye of a greedy king that faded in solitude; legend says it will bring infinite fortune to its owner
item.endrem.witch_eye.description: §7§oAfter lighting the Spiritfire, this is what remained of the Demon's Dream Fruit.
block.endrem.ender_eye.warning: This eye doesn't want to be used
block.endrem.custom_eye.frame_has_eye: This frame already has an eye
